page1.title: About
page1.content: Unlike English, there didn’t seem to be a easily discoverable collection of definitive, open source Irish language datasets for NLP research. . nlp.Irish hopes to address that by cataloguing the open source datasets available today . All of the information on this site is open source and is hosted at https://github.com/nlp-irish/nlp.irish . .

page2.content: . A collection of Irish language natural language processing (NLP) text datasets for NLP research. . Want to add to this collection? Feel free to add a pull request or open an issue on https://github.com/nlp-irish/nlp.irish . Datasets . General Corpora: . Task-specific corpora: .
